snippet: Glencore Xstrata said it would sell its Las Bambas copper mine in Peru to a group of state-owned Chinese companies. Separately, a Glencore subsidiary is buying Caracal Energy for about $1.3 billion.
abstract: Glencore Xstrata said it would sell its Las Bambas copper mine in Peru to a group of state-owned Chinese companies. Separately, a Glencore subsidiary is buying Caracal Energy for about $1.3 billion.

headline.main: Glencore to Sell Peruvian Mine to Chinese Group for $6 Billion
